title: [Large-scale] VR-based Project Flipped Culinary Practice Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic culinary techniques and ingredient preparation knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical environments utilizing VR equipment and digital devices, with team-based project execution.

learning_goals: Learners can perform three or more cooking processes step-by-step in a VR simulation environment
Learners can collaboratively produce one or more completed dishes through team collaboration and improve them based on feedback
Learners can integrate culinary theory and practical skills to develop creative recipe designs
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
